name: F1 2019: Car Livery 'VENUS - Ping'
detailed_description: Car livery for use in any mode supporting the new 2019 multiplayer car. The livery’s colours can also be edited in the customisation screen.
about_the_game: Car livery for use in any mode supporting the new 2019 multiplayer car. The livery’s colours can also be edited in the customisation screen.
short_description: Car livery for use in any mode supporting the new 2019 multiplayer car. The livery’s colours can also be edited in the customisation screen.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
